attributes.action: Ignore the Royal Society, which has called for the creation of a national space agency, and end the British space program which is a waste of money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is nothing on other planets or their moons that would be valuable. It wouldn't be beneficial to send any vehicles to the space, it would be a waste of money. Please don't set up that national space agency, we don't need it. You would just waste money. Please also end the British space program and stop paying ESA any money - let other nation waste their funds. Please spend that money on defence or roads instead.
